response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a discount, which we believe is a compelling proposition considering the product's worth to you is $1,500,000. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we will arrange for the transaction without delay. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
